about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm a passionate UX/UI professional dedicated to solving complex problems with user-centered design. I have a keen eye for detail and a commitment to creating intuitive, beautiful products that meet both user needs and business goals.
about.subheading: A mix of creativity, empathy, and technical knowledge to turn ideas into reality.
about.journeyParagraph1: Based in Brazil, I specialize in creating user-centered digital interfaces that combine aesthetics with functionality.
about.journeyParagraph2: I've had the privilege of working with leading companies like <1>Banco do Brasil</1>, <2>ImoBanco</2>, and <3>AevoTech</3>, where I've consistently delivered impactful design solutions.
about.journeyParagraph3: My approach combines user research, data-driven insights, and creative problem-solving to create digital experiences that not only look great but also solve real user problems and drive business objectives.
